long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imagine you are in office. You are writing a Blogger post, while you do not want any colleague know what you are doing. However, the Blogger logo in the left-top corner is prominently visible to anyone who is walking around your desk. This extension will help you by removing the image logo automatically in every 1 second.
